summary: This document is an email chain between Steve Smith, a Federal Sales Representative at SigNet Technologies, and an unidentified recipient regarding a quote for a DVR system upgrade. The email includes technical details and proposals for upgrading or replacing an existing security system.

persons.name: Steve Smith
persons.role: Federal Sales Representative at SigNet Technologies
persons.context: Steve Smith is the sender and primary contact in this email chain, providing quotes and technical proposals for a DVR system upgrade to an unidentified recipient.

events.title: Initial DVR Upgrade Inquiry
events.description: Steve Smith sends an initial email to an unidentified recipient to discuss a quote for a DVR system upgrade.

events.title: Follow-up on DVR Upgrade Options
events.description: Steve Smith follows up on the DVR upgrade inquiry, asking whether the recipient wants a complete system swap-out or to reuse existing components like the AMS and decoder.

events.title: Recipient Requests Quotes
events.description: The unidentified recipient responds to Steve Smith, requesting quotes for both a new complete system and an upgrade of the current system.

events.title: Proposal Submission for DVR Upgrade
events.description: Steve Smith sends the first of two proposals for the DVR upgrade, detailing options that reuse existing equipment versus a complete turnkey system.

locations: 12300 Kiln Ct Suite E Beltsville MD 20705
keyFacts: The document is an email chain regarding a DVR system upgrade quote from SigNet Technologies.
Steve Smith is identified as a Federal Sales Representative for SigNet Technologies.
The recipient of the email is not named, indicated only by a placeholder or redaction.
The correspondence involves technical details about reusing existing AMS and decoder equipment versus a complete system replacement.
The email includes standard confidentiality disclaimers from SigNet Technologies.
